description: A huge mutated worm found deep underground.  It has a gaping round mouth lined with dagger-like teeth, and its flesh is slick with bubbling blue slime.
A monstrous beast the size of a semi truck with a tripartite mouth that opens to reveal hundreds of writhing tongues with razor sharp edges.  It keeps most of its enormous body hidden underground.
A squiggling severed portion of a wounded giant worm.
A huge, mutated creature that might once have been a nightcrawler.  It possesses a large fanged mouth and a long slender body that comes up to your shoulder, with even more surely hiding underground.

A disturbingly large mutated subterranean creature similar to a nightcrawler.  It possesses a fanged mouth and a long slender body that comes up to your knees, with even more surely hiding underground.
A mutant cockroach the size of a small dog.
A giant infected roach, it has been feeding on the undead.
An infected mutant cockroach about the size of a rat.
This infected roach has been feeding on the undead and started to mutate chaotically.  Extra limbs and growths sprout from its thorax.
A mutant cockroach the size of a dog.
A baby mutant cockroach about the size of a rat.
A mutant cockroach the size of a small dog.  Its abdomen is heavily swollen.
A mutant bee the size of a small dog.
With a stinger the size of a kitchen knife, this dog-sized insect's black and yellow markings warn you to leave it undisturbed.
An enormous mutant bee with black and white markings and a long stinger spelling doom.
A brightly colored, many-legged mutant centipede the size of a dog.
A meter-long centipede with a menacing pair of pincers, moving swiftly on dozens of spindly legs.
An enormous mutant centipede with a menacing pair of pincers a seemingly infinite number of spindly legs.
A brightly colored, winged mutant dragonfly the size of a cat with sharp fangs.
A ferocious mutant dragonfly as big as a dog, darting through the air with a cluster of fangs for a mouth.
An enormous mutant dragonfly with long, glittering wings and a ferocious fanged mouth.
A mutant housefly the size of a small dog.  Its buzzing is high-pitched and somehow sad.
A tremendous housefly the size of a dog, predictably accompanied by a loud, incessant buzzing sound.
An enormous mutant housefly creating a loud buzzing sound.
A mutant mosquito the size of a small dog, buzzing and fluttering erratically.
A giant mutant mosquito, fluttering erratically.  Its face is dominated by a long, spear-tipped proboscis.
An enormous mutant mosquito with huge thin wings and legs.  Its face is dominated by a long, spear-tipped proboscis.
A mutant brown spider the size of a small dog with long thin legs, big eyes, and oversized fangs.
A twitchy mutant brown spider, with a relatively small body and spindly long legs.  Its smaller brethren are known for being agile, and for preying upon other spiders.
//: No, they are not in fact the most venomous spider in the world.

description: An enormous mutated brown spider with spindly long legs.  Looks like a classic house spider, but so much more.
A newly-hatched giant cellar spider.  Too small to possess much venom, but still quick and agile like an adult.
A mutant spider the size of a small dog with big forelegs, big eyes, and oversized fangs.
A giant spider with big forelegs and two pairs of inquisitive-looking eyes.  It can leap quite quickly, even into the treetops.
An enormous hairy mutated spider with strong forelegs and a raised, bloated thorax.  Smells like rotten eggs
A dark brown mutant spider the size of a dog with a bulbous thorax, big eyes, and oversized fangs.
A gigantic dark brown spider with a bulbous thorax.  It digs a deep underground burrow that serves as a pit to trap unwary prey.
An enormous mutated spider with strong thick legs, and a bulbous thorax, dark brown in color.
A light gray mutant spider the size of a dog with a long legs, big eyes, and oversized fangs.
A light gray giant mutated grass spider, it waits for prey to become ensnared in the vast webs that it weaves between the trees.
An enormous mutated grass spider with long spindly legs, light gray in color.
A still immature giant grass spider.  Too young to be venomous, or to walk proficiently for that matter
A black mutant spider the size of a cat with a long legs, big eyes, and oversized fangs.  There is a red hourglass shape on its thorax.
A giant mutated black widow spider.  There is a red hourglass shape on its thorax.  A highly venomous nightmare come to life.
An enormous mutated black widow spider.  There is a red hourglass shape on its thorax.
The horrid spawn of a giant black widow spider.  Even as a newborn, this foul creature knows only how to kill.
A shaggy brown mutant spider the size of a dog with a long legs, two especially big eyes, and oversized fangs.
A wolf spider mutated to about thirty times its normal size, it moves quickly and aggressively to catch and consume prey.
An enormous hairy mutant wolf spider.
A huge black and yellow mutant yellowjacket wasp the size of a ferret with a long, evil-looking stinger.
A gigantic slender-bodied wasp with an evil-looking stinger protruding from its abdomen.  Its exoskeleton glowers with ominous red markings.
An enormous slender-bodied wasp with an evil-looking stinger protruding from its abdomen.  Its exoskeleton glowers with ominous red markings.
A mutated wasp nearly the size of a cat, with a barbed ovipositor extruding from the abdomen.
A fat white grub as big as a squirrel, with a pair of large, spadelike mandibles.
A mutant red ant the size of a dog covered in chitinous plates.  It possesses a pair of wriggling antennae and vicious-looking mandibles.
An enormous red ant covered in chitinous plates.  It possesses a pair of wriggling antennae and vicious-looking mandibles.
A brown mutated ant with a swollen abdomen, that ends with a small orifice at the tip.  Glistening liquid drips out periodically.
A monstrous brown ant with a swollen abdomen, that ends with a small orifice at the tip.  Glistening liquid seems to drip out periodically.
A squirming yellow grub that seems to be oozing liquid from both ends of its body.  It appears its chitin hasn't developed enough to resist acid.

An enormous brown ant with an elongated, pulsating abdomen.  Its orifice seems developed only for egg-laying rather than spraying acid like the rest of the colony, but it doesn't seem affected by the acrid liquid either.
A massive woolly brown ant that towers over the worker ants with a giant head crest.  Along with its huge mandibles, a corrosive liquid seeps from the end of its bloated abdomen.
A pulsating sausage of glistening white flesh, the size of a large cat.  On one end is a set of squirming mouth parts.
A colossal red ant with a bulging, bloated thorax.  It moves slowly and deliberately, tending to nearby eggs and continually laying more.
A huge and hairy red ant almost twice the size of other giant ants.  Bulging pincers extend from its jaws.
An enormous hairy red ant.  Bulging pincers extend from its jaws.
A yellow and brown mutated locust the size of a cat with big eyes and long powerful legs.
A yellow and brown mutated locust the size of a dog with big eyes and long powerful legs.  You don't think it'll eat you but it could cause massive damage to nearby plants.
An enormous yellow and brown mutated locust with huge staring eyes and long powerful legs.
A locust the size of a rabbit.  You'd hate to think what a swarm of these could do.
